summary: The Queen of the Night battles the Queen of the Sun over a magical diamond that will allow the winner to remain on Earth, specifically in modern day Paris.
cast: Juliet Berto|Bulle Ogier|Jean Babilée|Hermine Karagheuz|Nicole Garcia|Claire Nadeau|Elisabeth Wiener|Jean Wiener|André Dauchy|Roger Fugen
title: Duelle (une quarantaine)
